channel.title: David Keck
channel.description: Software development and a passion for learning. Periodic updates on current projects, thoughts, problems, solutions, and ideas.

item.title: Welcome.
item.description:
Hello, and welcome to my website.

I’m David Keck, and I’ll be your guide.

This site will contain quick dips into whatever I’m working on or thinking about.

Right now, I’m learning how to make a website. I’m using Jekyll, which has been wonderful so far. It’s exactly what I was looking for. I highly recommend it to anyone who might also want to start a blog and isn’t super fond of Wordpress.
